name: Castle League
description:
Go head-to-head against another castle in this intense VR game. Shoot boulders, duck for cover, send out your minions, stall the opposition but above all: keep your own castle moving.

Race with castles/VR Multiplayer/VR Movement

  • PC-Meta Quest
  • Competitive Exergame
  • 1 v AI (1v1 / XvX)
  • 2-3m / round
  • Young people that don’t exercise too often

Castle League team:

  • Marnick
  • Arne
  • Nathan
  • Thorvald
  • Ioana
